en-US.summary: Learn fun facts about Joe Pesci.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask Joe Pesci facts for a fact
Alexa tell Joe Pesci facts to tell me trivia
en-US.name: Joe Pesci Facts
en-US.description:
Ask for Joe Pesci Facts, and learn about everyone favorite film gangster.

Joe Pesci Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Joe Pesci Facts" or "Alexa, open Joe Pesci Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This skill was made using the Fact sample.
